    JeszenszkiBasis.@sz_str — Macro.

    Non-standard string literal sz.

    Convert a space-separated string to an occupation vector.

    Basis of occupation vectors with a site occupation restriction.

    JeszenszkiBasis.num_vectors — Function.
    num_vectors(N::Int, K::Int)

    Compute the number of vectors in a basis with N particles and K sites.

    num_vectors(N::Int, K::Int, M::Int)

    Compute the number of vectors in a basis with N particles and K sites, and a limit of M particles per site.

    num_vectors(basis::AbstractSzbasis, N::Int, K::Int)

    Compute the number of vectors in a basis with N particles and K sites, and a limit of as many particles per site as in basis.

    JeszenszkiBasis.serial_num — Function.
    serial_num(K::Int, N::Int, v::AbstractVector{Int})

    Compute the serial number of occupation vector v in a basis with K sites and N particles.

    serial_num(K::Int, N::Int, M::Int, v::AbstractVector{Int})

    Compute the serial number of occupation vector v in a basis with K sites and N particles, and a limit of M particles per site.

    serial_num(basis::AbstractSzbasis, v::AbstractVector{Int})

    Compute the serial number of occupation vector v in basis.

    serial_num(basis::AbstractSzbasis, K::Int, N::Int, v::AbstractVector{Int})

    Compute the serial number of occupation vector v in a basis with N particles and K sites, and a limit of as many particles per site as in basis.

    JeszenszkiBasis.site_max — Function.
    site_max(basis::AbstractSzbasis)

    Get the maximum number of particles on a site in basis.

    JeszenszkiBasis.sub_serial_num — Function.
    sub_serial_num(basis::AbstractSzbasis, v::AbstractVector{Int})

    Compute the serial number of the reduced occupation vector v, which has only a subset of the sites present in basis.

    JeszenszkiBasis.to_str — Function.
    to_str(v::Vector{Int})

    Convert an occupation vector v to a space-separated string.
